text: (he nabee!) yadi laabh sameep aur yaatra saral hotee, to ye (munaafiq) avashy aapake saath ho jaate. parantu unhen maarg door laga aur (ab) allaah kee shapath lenge ki yadi ham nikal sakate, to avashy tumhaare saath nikal padate, ve apana vinaash svayan kar rahe hain aur allaah jaanata hai ki ve vaastav mein jhoothe hain
